string.value: You hear that #p1012101# is very sick...

A girl named Maya in Henesys has been ill for a long time. It looks like she can't live a normal life at all. You agree to help her. #bWeird Medicine#k... What a strange name! She says she'll get a little better by taking that... You should go to Lith Harbor and see this guy Teo...

Maya wanted you to go see Teo of Lith Harbor, so you did just that. He promised to give you the Weird Medicine only after you get him a Sparkling Rock. Geez, he won't even give any free medicine for a sick girl?

Cough...cough... Oh, hello stranger. Sorry, but may I ask you for a favor? I've been sick for a while, and the doctors can't do anything. Lately, it has gotten so bad I can't even take care of myself.

Is there any way you can get me some #b#t4031006##k? I am not sure exactly how to get that, but #r#p1002001##k from #b#m104000000##k may know a thing or two about it. Please help me. Cough...cough...Pardon me.
You haven't met up with #r#p1002001##k, yet? #p1002001# from #b#m104000000##k can definitely help you find some #p1002001#. Please...talk to him for me...
